parameters: I can't see the stairs where I came.
I can't see the stairs where I came.
The door disappeared, leaving only a brick wall.
The door disappeared, leaving only a brick wall.
There's a dark staircase leading downward, you feel a cool gust of wind blowing through it.
There is a toy camera hanging on the wall.
Press \BK[2]\PK[1] to invert the image, press \BK[6]\PK[2] to exit.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I think I heard a little girl's laughter behind me.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]My ears might've played a trick on me...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I mean, you sound a bit superstitious, are you scared?
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]I'm a cop...\.I don't believe in ghosts.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]We walked down such a long staircase, and now we are at the entrance again...
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]But the atmosphere here feels different from what it was earlier.
The cordon has talismans stuck all over it, you cannot move forward.
The bead curtain has talismans stuck all over it, you cannot move forward.
A page that has been torn out from a diary is stuck to the wall.
\c[2]Lin Lixun \c[0]Ms. Chen, have you ever heard of the Tian family's \c[1]soul summoning \c[0] stuff?
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]Mhm, Fangfang's grandma found a witch in the city.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]The witch could summon the soul of the dead and attach it to herself.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]So relatives could talk to the dead through the witch.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0]I told Fangfang several times that this was superstitious nonsense.
\c[2]Chen Qingsui \c[0] But Fangfang's grandparents were convinced, and they often took Fangfang with them.
